    • Uses of IListener in marge.middleware.listener.view

      Constructors in marge.middleware.listener.view with parameters of type IListener 
      Constructor and Description
      TikitagEventView(IListener model)
      The view is a JTabbedPane with 2 Tabs (2 JComponent
      The first tab is event table that updated real time events
      The second one is data table that is reported by system
      At the end of JTabbedPane is a JTextArea that shows the information of event more detail

    • Uses of IListener in marge.middleware.publisher.specification

      Methods in marge.middleware.publisher.specification with parameters of type IListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IPublisher.addListener(IListener listener)
      This method is called when IListener wants to register himself and receive events from IPublisher
      IListener now takes a role as a subscriber
      The IEvent will be notified automatically from IListener to IListener via a EventBus system
      Add a Subscribe to list
      void AbstractPublisher.addListener(IListener listener)
